content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel so ashamed since I saw my boyfriend flirting my friend.
That is so disappointing. You have been a very strong person to come out of this, despite what happened.
Yes, I should have been strong. But it is super frustrating.
I' m sorry to hear that. Have you considered talking to your friends about this? This can be a very difficult situation to be in.
